enhanced_description: HeartVoice, a joint venture between OMRON Healthcare and iAPPS Pte Ltd., delivers a comprehensive suite of medtech solutions aimed at achieving zero cardiac events and improving health outcomes. The platform offers preventive healthcare services tailored for healthcare providers, patients, and corporate clients. For businesses, HeartVoice provides corporate wellness solutions where employees can monitor vital health statistics like blood pressure and body composition via dedicated kiosks and a mobile application. These readings are seamlessly linked to a Doctor Dashboard, facilitating easy communication, analysis, and continuous remote monitoring by medical professionals. Key services include virtual consultations with Singapore-registered doctors for primary care, personalized guidance for developing healthier lifestyle habits to mitigate risks of heart attack and stroke, and robust chronic disease management capabilities.
